Movie.Title: Ant-Man
Movie.Synopsis: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

Movie.Title: The Avengers
Movie.Synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

Movie.Title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
Movie.Synopsis: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's Mightiest Heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

Movie.Title: Black Panther
Movie.Synopsis: T'Challa, the new ruler of the advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must defend his land from being torn apart by enemies from outside and inside the country.

Movie.Title: Captain America: The First Avenger
Movie.Synopsis: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

Movie.Title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
Movie.Synopsis: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and Shield agent, the Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

Movie.Title: Captain America: Civil War
Movie.Synopsis: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

Movie.Title: Captain Marvel
Movie.Synopsis: A human woman receives powers from an encounter with the alien Kree Empire.

Movie.Title: Doctor Strange
Movie.Synopsis: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

Movie.Title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
Movie.Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

Movie.Title: The Incredible Hulk
Movie.Synopsis: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.

Movie.Title: Iron Man
Movie.Synopsis: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, a billionaire engineer creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Movie.Title: Iron Man 2
Movie.Synopsis: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

Movie.Title: Iron Man 3
Movie.Synopsis: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

Movie.Title: Thor
Movie.Synopsis: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

Movie.Title: Thor: The Dark World
Movie.Synopsis: When Dr. Jane Foster gets cursed with a powerful entity known as the Aether, Thor is heralded of the cosmic event known as the Convergence and the genocidal Dark Elves.

OneShot.Title: The Consultant
OneShot.Synopsis: Agents Coulson and Sitwell plan to derail General Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross from interfering with S.H.I.E.L.D. affairs with a very special person.

OneShot.Title: A Funny Thing Happened On The Way To Thor's Hammer
OneShot.Synopsis: Agent Coulson stops at a convenience store and deals with a coincidental robbery during his visit.

OneShot.Title: Item 47
OneShot.Synopsis: SHIELD agent Sitwell is assigned to recover an abandoned Chitauri weapon being used by a young couple robbing a bank.

OneShot.Title: Agent Carter
OneShot.Synopsis: Frustrated at being marginalized at work, Peggy Carter goes on an unauthorized solo field mission.

OneShot.Title: All Hail The King
OneShot.Synopsis: A documentary filmmaker interviews the now-famous Trevor Slattery from behind bars.

Show.Description: In 1946, Peggy Carter is relegated to secretarial duties in the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR). When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

Episode.Title: Now Is Not The End
Episode.Synopsis: In 1946, Peggy Carter is now a secretary for the Strategic Scientific Reserve. Howard Stark asks her for help when the country believes that he is selling deadly weapons to their enemies.

Episode.Title: Bridge And Tunnel
Episode.Synopsis: Howard Stark's deadliest weapon has fallen into enemy hands, and only Agent Carter can recover it. But can she do so before her undercover mission is discovered by SSR Chief Dooley and Agent Thompson?

Episode.Title: Time And Tide
Episode.Synopsis: As Agent Carter closes in on Howard Stark's stolen technology, Peggy's secret mission could unravel when the SSR arrests Jarvis and a secret is revealed.

Episode.Title: The Blitzkrieg Button
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy may be in more trouble than usual when fugitive Howard Stark suddenly returns for mysterious reasons. And Chief Dooley chases a new clue all the way to Europe that threatens to destroy Peggy's future at the SSR.

Episode.Title: The Iron Ceiling
Episode.Synopsis: Carter finally gets a chance to prove herself as she is sent on a mission in Russia with Agent Thompson and the Howling Commandos. Meanwhile, Agent Sousa makes an important discovery.

Episode.Title: A Sin To Err
Episode.Synopsis: Carter believes that the spy that stole Stark's technology is a woman. The SSR now knows that Carter is helping Stark. There's a new spy in the agency.

Episode.Title: SNAFU
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy is cornered and more vulnerable than ever as Leviathan makes their move against her. As the SSR zeroes in on Howard Stark, they may pay the ultimate price as they find their true enemy is closer than they realized.

Episode.Title: Valediction
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy faces the full fury of Leviathan, as Howard Stark makes his return.

Episode.Title: The Lady In The Lake
Episode.Synopsis: Dedicated to the fight against new Atomic Age threats in the wake of World War II, Agent Carter journeys from New York City to Los Angeles for her most dangerous and bizarre assignment yet.

Episode.Title: A View In The Dark
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy discovers her murder investigation has huge ramifications that can destroy her career, as well as everyone near and dear to her.

Episode.Title: Better Angels
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy's pursuit of the truth about Zero Matter places her on a collision course with her superiors.

Episode.Title: Smoke And Mirrors
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy and the SSR discover that beautiful Hollywood star Whitney Frost harbors a dangerous secret, and that she's more than just a pretty face.

Episode.Title: The Atomic Job
Episode.Synopsis: As Jarvis' precision and quick-thinking skills are put to the ultimate test, Peggy must find a way to stop an atomic explosion that threatens to destroy all of California.

Episode.Title: Life Of The Party
Episode.Synopsis: When Peggy realizes she cannot save Wilkes on her own, she turns to her most unexpected adversary for help while Whitney makes a move to control the deadly Zero Matter.

Episode.Title: Monsters
Episode.Synopsis: As Peggy plots a rescue mission, Whitney hunts for even more dark power; and Jarvis learns he should not make promises he cannot keep.

Episode.Title: The Edge Of Mystery
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy and Sousa propose a trade with Whitney Frost, while the SSR gets help from Howard Stark that may be the key to eliminating Zero Matter.

Episode.Title: A Little Song And Dance
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy desperately tries to save Dr. Wilkes with a dangerous plan to stop Whitney Frost. But Thompson makes a surprising move that could destroy them all.

Episode.Title: Hollywood Ending
Episode.Synopsis: Peggy needs Howard Stark to eliminate Zero Matter as they are faced with a mission none of them could come back.

Show.Description: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.

Episode.Title: Pilot
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D. puts together a special team, led by Agent Phil Coulson, to track down a mysterious man with special abilities and the young computer hacker that's encouraging him to reveal himself to the world.
While extracting a strange object out of Peru, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents are taken hostage aboard their plane.

Episode.Title: The Asset
Episode.Synopsis: Dr. Franklin Hall has been kidnapped. Coulson and his team are assigned to rescue him.

Episode.Title: Eye Spy
Episode.Synopsis: The team tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing valuable information.

Episode.Title: Girl In The Flower Dress
Episode.Synopsis: Centipede kidnaps another gifted man. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to track them down. Also, secrets about Skye are revealed.

Episode.Title: FZZT
Episode.Synopsis: Simmons becomes infected with an alien virus after exposing herself to a group of people that have come into contact with a Chitauri helmet.

Episode.Title: The Hub
Episode.Synopsis: Ward and Fitz are sent on a classified mission in South Ossetia.

Episode.Title: The Well
Episode.Synopsis: Ward becomes exposed to a piece of an Asgardian staff, which causes his worst memory to resurface.

Episode.Title: Repairs
Episode.Synopsis: The agents investigate the strange occurrences of a woman who, they believe, has telekinetic powers.

Episode.Title: The Bridge
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D. receives assistance from Mike Peterson as they take on Centipede once again.

Episode.Title: The Magical Place
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D. organizes a full scale hunt for Coulson. Centipede tries to resurface the memories on what happened after Coulson died.

Episode.Title: Seeds
Episode.Synopsis: While investigating a problem at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy, Coulson and May turn up unexpected information about Skye's parents.

Episode.Title: T.R.A.C.K.S.
Episode.Synopsis: The team tries to confiscate an important device on a train, but when one agent takes a very risky move that backfires, the entire team is affected.

Episode.Title: T.A.H.I.T.I.
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson and the team rush to Bethesda in an attempt to save Skye's life.

Episode.Title: Yes Men
Episode.Synopsis: While Skye recovers, Lady Sif arrives with need of assistance in capturing an escaped Asgardian prisoner, named Lorelei.

Episode.Title: End Of The Beginning
Episode.Synopsis: Agent Garett and Triplett have returned to assist Coulson's team hunt down S.H.I.E.L.D.'s devious nemesis--the Clairvoyant. But will Deathlok kill them all to guard his master's identity?

Episode.Title: Turn, Turn, Turn
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D. has been compromised by an old enemy. The team doesn't know whom to trust.

Episode.Title: Providence
Episode.Synopsis: With Colonel Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team seek refuge in the last place anyone would look, where they begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'S most dangerous secrets -- secrets that could destroy them all.

Episode.Title: The Only Light In The Darkness
Episode.Synopsis: Agent Koenig puts the team through the ultimate lie detector test and Coulson races to protect an old flame from an old enemy.

Episode.Title: Nothing Personal
Episode.Synopsis: Just when there's no one left to trust, Agent Maria Hill returns to team up with Coulson as S.H.I.E.L.D. is being destroyed around them.

Episode.Title: Ragtag
Episode.Synopsis: Ward's betrayal and HYDRA's shocking secrets are revealed as Coulson's team goes undercover on a mission that leaves no one unscathed.

Episode.Title: Beginning Of The End
Episode.Synopsis: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of HYDRA.

Episode.Title: Shadows
Episode.Synopsis: Carl Creel is sent after an item that was stolen from Hydra during WWII. Fitz tries to cope with his mental issues.

Episode.Title: Heavy Is The Head
Episode.Synopsis: Hunter gets captured by General Talbot. May goes after Creel and the Obelisk.

Episode.Title: Making Friends And Influencing People
Episode.Synopsis: Simmons is forced to help Hydra capture Donnie Gill. S.H.I.E.L.D. tries to get to him first.

Episode.Title: Face My Enemy
Episode.Synopsis: When May gets kidnapped, Hydra sends out an impersonator to lure Coulson into a trap. Fitz tries to find the confidence to join the rest of the team in their social activities.

Episode.Title: A Hen In The Wolf House
Episode.Synopsis: Raina threatens to expose Simmons to Hydra unless Coulson hands Skye over to her father.

Episode.Title: A Fractured House
Episode.Synopsis: The world turns against S.H.I.E.L.D. when Hydra impersonates them to attack The United Nations, and an unexpected enemy leads the charge to bring about their downfall.

Episode.Title: The Writing On The Wall
Episode.Synopsis: A mysterious man is killing off former S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and carving the same markings as Coulson. Coulson tries to track him down. Meanwhile, May leads a team on a manhunt for Ward.

Episode.Title: The Things We Bury
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson and team find themselves in an epic face-off against Hydra to uncover an ancient secret, while Ward kidnaps his brother, Senator Christian Ward, for a violent trip down memory lane.

Episode.Title: Ye Who Enter Here
Episode.Synopsis: While Coulson's team tries to find the entrance to the mysterious alien city, the rest of the agents try to rescue Raina when they find out that Hydra is after her.

Episode.Title: What They Become
Episode.Synopsis: Whitehall and Coulson's forces take part in an explosive confrontation that changes everyone. Skye uncovers some truths about her past.

Episode.Title: Aftershocks
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson and the team are faced with the consequences of the war with Hydra. As revelations threaten to destroy them, Hydra makes a move.

Episode.Title: Who You Really Are
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson and the team help a confused Lady Sif, who has lost her memory after a battle with a mysterious warrior.

Episode.Title: One Of Us
Episode.Synopsis: Cal wants vengeance, so he rallies a team of super villains to crush S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile, May turns to her ex-husband, Dr. Andrew Garner, to help with a crisis threatening the harmony of the team.

Episode.Title: Love In The Time Of Hydra
Episode.Synopsis: The team are bewildered by a recent shocking revelation as they face a difficult decision. Meanwhile, Bobbi and Mack declare their loyalty to Hunter; and Ward and Agent 33 take care of a private matter.

Episode.Title: One Door Closes
Episode.Synopsis: War comes to Coulson's doorstep in a way he never anticipated as shocking revelations are brought to light, and Skye struggles to control her new abilities but will soon make a decision that irrevocably changes her life.

Episode.Title: Afterlife
Episode.Synopsis: As Robert Gonzalez makes his move, Coulson must do whatever it takes to protect the future of S.H.I.E.L.D. Meanwhile Skye's journey to control her powers take a surprising turn when she meets the enigmatic Inhuman named Lincoln.

Episode.Title: Melinda
Episode.Synopsis: The story of Melinda May's transformation into "The Cavalry" is revealed as she finds herself at a crossroads in the war between Coulson and Gonzales. As Skye learns more about her true heritage from Lincoln, the truth about Inhumans will send her in a new direction.

Episode.Title: Frenemy Of My Enemy
Episode.Synopsis: A dangerous new alliance is formed as Coulson and Hunter turn to the last person anyone would expect, Grant Ward! As the war between S.H.I.E.L.D. factions continues, Skye and Lincoln will find themselves drawn into this conflict.

Episode.Title: The Dirty Half Dozen
Episode.Synopsis: Gonzales and Coulson must find a way to put their differences aside and work together against HYDRA, even if it means teaming up with someone they don't trust.

Episode.Title: Scars
Episode.Synopsis: As tensions rise between S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Inhumans, Skye finds herself torn between the groups; Coulson reveals a secret.

Episode.Title: S.O.S. Part 1
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D puts everything on the line to survive a war that blurs the line between friend and foe. Coulson and his team will be forced to make shocking sacrifices that will leave their relationships and their world changed forever.

Episode.Title: S.O.S. Part 2
Episode.Synopsis: The battle between SHIELD and the Inhumans reaches its peak. SHIELD must defend their own and keep Skye safe.

Episode.Title: Laws Of Nature
Episode.Synopsis: Director Phil Coulson and Agent Daisy Johnson leading the charge as S.H.I.E.L.D. searches the world for more powered people in the aftermath of their epic battle with Jiaying and her army of Inhumans. However, Coulson and the team soon find out that they are not the only group looking for these new Inhumans.

Episode.Title: Purpose In The Machine
Episode.Synopsis: Fitz and the team enlist the aid of an Asgardian to unlock the secrets of the ancient monolith that swallowed Simmons, and Agent May is at a crossroads in her personal and professional life.

Episode.Title: A Wanted (Inhu)man
Episode.Synopsis: Mack, Daisy, and Coulson race against time to keep Lincoln safe; Hunter will do whatever it takes to get revenge.

Episode.Title: Devils You Know
Episode.Synopsis: Having reluctantly agreed to share information with Rosalind and the ATCU, Coulson and the team search for the Inhuman who is killing other Inhumans; May feels that Hunter's mission to take down Ward is getting too personal.

Episode.Title: 4,722 Hours
Episode.Synopsis: After her dramatic rescue from another planet, Simmons is still reeling from her ordeal and reveals how she had to fight for her life in a harsh new world.

Episode.Title: Among Us Hide...
Episode.Synopsis: The stakes get higher as May and Hunter pursue Ward and Hydra; Coulson thinks the ATCU could be keeping a big secret.

Episode.Title: Chaos Theory
Episode.Synopsis: As Daisy and the team try to protect Inhumans, a shocking truth is revealed about S.H.I.E.L.D.'s biggest enemy; with Fitz's help, Simmons recovers information that could get them back through the portal.

Episode.Title: Many Heads, One Tale
Episode.Synopsis: Dangerous facts about the ATCU are discovered by the team; Ward's plans to take down S.H.I.E.L.D. do not go as expected.

Episode.Title: Closure
Episode.Synopsis: Ward's vendetta and plan for revenge against S.H.I.E.L.D. brings the team to their knees, and Coulson proves he will be willing to do anything to settle the conflict.

Episode.Title: Maveth
Episode.Synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D battles Hydra head-to-head, which sees Coulson and Fitz take the ultimate risk while Daisy and the Inhumans try to keep Hydra at bay.

Episode.Title: Bouncing Back
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson is more determined than ever to get to Gideon Malick and put to an end to Hydra once and for all in the aftermath of his trip to Maveth. Meanwhile, Daisy and the team encounter more Inhumans who have powers like they've never seen before, but will they be friends or enemies of S.H.I.E.L.D?

Episode.Title: The Inside Man
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson and the team investigate an international conference on the fate of the Inhumans. Back on the bus, Fitzsimmons may have found a way to stop the Inhuman gene from spreading.

Episode.Title: Parting Shot
Episode.Synopsis: After tracking Malick to Russia, Bobbi and Hunter become involved in an assassination plot; the team is changed forever as they race to save lives in the balance.

Episode.Title: Watchdogs
Episode.Synopsis: Agent Mack and his brother step in when a radical group called the Watchdogs plan to eliminate the Inhumans; Simmons finds a powerful chemical compound.

Episode.Title: Spacetime
Episode.Synopsis: When Daisy gets a horrifying glimpse of the future, S.H.I.E.L.D. races to prove that fate is not fixed.

Episode.Title: Paradise Lost
Episode.Synopsis: The team hunts for information on a new enemy; Malick's secret from his past threatens to destroy his Hydra legacy.

Episode.Title: The Team
Episode.Synopsis: Agent Daisy Johnson must call upon the Secret Warriors for an inaugural mission that will leave no member unscathed, and S.H.I.E.L.D. learns more about Hive's powers, forcing them to question everyone they trust.

Episode.Title: The Singularity
Episode.Synopsis: The S.H.I.E.L.D. team is left reeling and decimated as Hive continues to sway Inhumans to his side. But there is a sliver of hope as Agents Fitz and Simmons follow a lead that may be able to stop the maniacal Inhuman once and for all.

Episode.Title: Failed Experiments
Episode.Synopsis: As the threat of Hive looms, loyalties are put to the test and the team must come up with a decisive resolution.

Episode.Title: Emancipation
Episode.Synopsis: In the aftermath of the events of Captain America: Civil War (2016), S.H.I.E.L.D feels pressure to reveal their involvement with Inhumans. But with the stakes higher than ever and Hive growing stronger, the team is tested in ways they could never anticipate.

Episode.Title: Absolution
Episode.Synopsis: It's a showdown a season in the making as S.H.I.E.L.D. takes on Hive, and when his master plan is finally revealed, the team must spring into action.

Episode.Title: Ascension
Episode.Synopsis: In the conclusion to "Absolution," S.H.I.E.L.D. must spring into action to combat Hive.

Episode.Title: The Ghost
Episode.Synopsis: Daisy has left S.H.I.E.L.D. and is trying to solve the mystery of a bunch of serial killings in the Los Angeles area. At the same time her old friends suspect her for the killings and are following her trail in an attempt to find her.

Episode.Title: Meet The New Boss
Episode.Synopsis: Daisy goes to battle Ghost Rider at a terrible cost, and Coulson faces the new Director, and his bold agenda surprises them all.

Episode.Title: Uprising
Episode.Synopsis: Coulson, Mack and Fitz try to locate and neutralize a rogue group looking to stop Inhuman registration worldwide; Simmons and Dr. Radcliffe have only a short time to save May before she succumbs to her illness.

Episode.Title: Let Me Stand Next To Your Fire
Episode.Synopsis: As Ghost Rider's quest for vengeance brings him into an explosive confrontation with S.H.I.E.L.D., Coulson and Mack must rely on an unlikely ally in their time of desperate need; and Daisy reunites with a familiar face to stop the Watchdogs.

Episode.Title: Lockup
Episode.Synopsis: As Robbie Reyes struggles to control The Ghost Rider, S.H.I.E.L.D. infiltrates a high-security prison to unravel the secrets that haunt them all.

Episode.Title: The Good Samaritan
Episode.Synopsis: The shocking origin story of Robbie's transition into Ghost Rider is revealed as the lives of Coulson and the team hang in the balance.

Episode.Title: Deals With Our Devils
Episode.Synopsis: With the loss of half the team, the remaining members search for answers as the clock counts down for Ghost Rider.

Episode.Title: The Laws Of Inferno Dynamics
Episode.Synopsis: With the lives of everyone in Los Angeles hanging in the balance, S.H.I.E.L.D. and Ghost Rider find themselves working together.

Show.Description: Two teenagers from very different backgrounds find themselves burdened and awakened to newly acquired superpowers while falling in love.

Based on the organization created in the Marvel Comic universe. Damage Control is an entity headed by a financial steward that tries to repair, replace or remediate collateral damage (originally in New York) caused by fights involving superheroes and super villains. This was before government legislated such regulation initiating Marvel's Civil War.
Matt Murdock, with his other senses superhumanly enhanced, fights crime as a blind Lawyer by day, and vigilante by night.

Episode.Title: Into The Ring
Episode.Synopsis: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson open their law firm, and take the case of a woman accused of murder who Matt believes is innocent.

Episode.Title: Cut Man
Episode.Synopsis: Murdock makes a near fatal error while trying to save a kidnapped boy, and finds an unlikely ally when he needs saving himself.

Episode.Title: Rabbit In A Snow Storm
Episode.Synopsis: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.

Episode.Title: In The Blood
Episode.Synopsis: Two vicious Russian brothers working for Fisk strike back against Daredevil. Fisk moves to further consolidate his power in the criminal underworld.

Episode.Title: World On Fire
Episode.Synopsis: Fisk moves forward with plans that threaten to rip Hell's Kitchen apart. Murdock and Foggy take on a case helping tenants victimised by a slumlord.

Episode.Title: Condemned
Episode.Synopsis: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.

Episode.Title: Stick
Episode.Synopsis: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.

Episode.Title: Shadows In The Glass
Episode.Synopsis: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.

Episode.Title: Speak Of The Devil
Episode.Synopsis: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.

Episode.Title: Nelson VS Murdock
Episode.Synopsis: After Foggy and Murdock's relationship has taken a turn for the worst, a new enemy of Fisk has surfaced.

Episode.Title: The Path Of The Righteous
Episode.Synopsis: Fisk and Murdock wrestle with the consequences of their chosen paths, while Ben and Karen get closer to Fisk's true past.

Episode.Title: The Ones We Leave Behind
Episode.Synopsis: Fisk seeks revenge while Karen is haunted by recent events. Daredevil makes a startling discovery about Fisk's financing.

Episode.Title: Daredevil
Episode.Synopsis: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy, and Karen are forced to play their end games.

Episode.Title: Bang
Episode.Synopsis: In the void left by Fisk's removal, a new threat to Hell's Kitchen emerges. Murdock and Foggy take on a client with a questionable past.

Episode.Title: Dogs To A Gunfight
Episode.Synopsis: As Murdock recovers from an attack, Foggy and Karen fight to protect their new client from both the law and the Kitchen's newest vigilante.

Episode.Title: New York's Finest
Episode.Synopsis: Trapped face-to-face with the Punisher, Daredevil wrestles with the morality of vigilante justice. Meanwhile, Foggy and Karen work to save the firm.

Episode.Title: Penny And Dime
Episode.Synopsis: Karen uncovers shocking facts about the Punisher, who finds himself hunted by a powerful force in Hell's Kitchen. Daredevil ponders his next moves.

Episode.Title: Kinbaku
Episode.Synopsis: A former lover arrives in Hell's Kitchen and turns Murdock's world upside down. Karen digs for the truth about the Punisher.

Episode.Title: Regrets Only
Episode.Synopsis: A lethal foe returns with a vengeance, Foggy and Murdock risk the firm to ensure justice, and Karen sees a different side of the Punisher.

Episode.Title: Semper Fidelis
Episode.Synopsis: Murdock and Foggy take on the DA in the trial of the century, but their client refuses to play along. Murdock struggles to balance his dual identities.

Episode.Title: Guilty As Sin
Episode.Synopsis: As the firm's trial spins out of control, a figure from Murdock's past returns to deliver shocking revelations about the future of Hell's Kitchen.

Episode.Title: Seven Minutes In Heaven
Episode.Synopsis: Castle gets an offer he can't refuse. Foggy and Murdock question the future of their firm, but Karen won't give up so easily.

Episode.Title: The Man In The Box
Episode.Synopsis: Murdock and Foggy get caught in the crossfire of the Punisher's revenge. Karen and Murdock dig for the truth in very different ways.

Karen starts working with Frank to bring the mysterious Blacksmith down. Claire quits her job as the hospital's administration are trying to keep her silent. Matt visits Madame Gao to get information on Blacksmith.

Episode.Title: The Dark At The End Of The Tunnel
Episode.Synopsis: Daredevil goes underground to save an old friend. Karen follows a dangerous lead. The law firm of Nelson and Murdock may have reached its final chapter.

Episode.Title: A Cold Day In Hell's Kitchen
Episode.Synopsis: In the season finale, Daredevil is backed into the ultimate showdown for his own life - and the future of Hell's Kitchen.

Show.Description: A young man is bestowed with incredible martial arts skills and a mystical force known as the Iron Fist.
A former superhero decides to reboot her life by becoming a private investigator.

Episode.Title: Ladies Night
Episode.Synopsis: Jessica Jones is hired to find a pretty NYU student who's vanished, but it turns out to be more than a simple missing persons case.

Episode.Title: Crush Syndrome
Episode.Synopsis: Jessica vows to prove Hope's innocence, even though it means tracking down a terrifying figure from her own past.

Episode.Title: It's Called Whiskey
Episode.Synopsis: It won't be easy to acquire or deploy but Jessica thinks she's found a weapon to use against Kilgrave. Luke and Jessica bond over their similarities.

Episode.Title: 99 Friends
Episode.Synopsis: A new case demands attention as Jessica tries to find out who's spying on her for Kilgrave. Trish's radio show yields unexpected consequences.

Episode.Title: The Sandwich Saved Me
Episode.Synopsis: Despite Jessica's objections, Trish's new friend Simpson gets involved in the hunt for Kilgrave. Jessica recalls a pivotal moment in her life.

Episode.Title: You're A Winner
Episode.Synopsis: Luke hires Jessica to help him find someone who may have skipped town, but she fears he'll learn too much about her history in the process.

Episode.Title: Top Shelf Perverts
Episode.Synopsis: Malcom, Simpson and Trish go rogue to prevent Jessica from carrying out an extreme plan to outwit Kilgrave.

Episode.Title: WWJD
Episode.Synopsis: Jessica experiences a strange homecoming courtesy of Kilgrave. Hogarth's conflict with her estranged wife reaches a tipping point.

Episode.Title: Sin Bin
Episode.Synopsis: Just when Jessica has Kilgrave right where she wants him, Hogarth's involvement complicates the situation. Details of Kilgrave's past emerge.

Episode.Title: 1000 Cuts
Episode.Synopsis: A discovery has the potential to change the entire game -- if Jessica can refuse Kilgrave's offer.

Episode.Title: I've Got The Blues
Episode.Synopsis: Jessica searches morgues for clues. Trish goes all out to keep Simpson from getting in Jessica's way. Malcolm has an epiphany.

Episode.Title: Take A Bloody Number
Episode.Synopsis: The hunt for Kilgrave reunites Jessica with Luke. Trish receives some unexpected information about Simpson and Jessica.

Episode.Title: Smile
Episode.Synopsis: Jessica and Luke get help from someone else in the neighborhood. Kilgrave gears up for a major test of powers against Jessica.

Show.Description: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.

Episode.Title: Moment Of Truth
Episode.Synopsis: With tension building in the streets of Harlem thanks to ruthless club owner Cottonmouth, Luke finds it increasingly difficult to live a quiet life.

Episode.Title: Code Of The Streets
Episode.Synopsis: Luke is pulled deeper into the fight for his neighborhood when, as a favor to an old friend, he tries to help a kid who's in trouble with Cottonmouth.

Episode.Title: Who's Gonna Take The Weight
Episode.Synopsis: In the aftermath of a chaotic event at a favorite Harlem hangout, Luke heeds the call to action and hits Cottonmouth where he'll feel it most.

Episode.Title: Step In The Arena
Episode.Synopsis: As he rescues a victim of Cottonmouth's vengeance, Luke remembers his earlier life and the conspiracy that led to his superhuman strength.

Episode.Title: Just To Get A Rep
Episode.Synopsis: Cottonmouth strikes back at Luke by taking his vengeance out on the people of Harlem, while detective Knight and Scarfe face an unexpected threat.

Episode.Title: Suckas Need Bodyguards
Episode.Synopsis: After Cottonmouth and Scarfe's bloody clash, Luke realizes that saving the community may turn former allies into enemies, and enemies into allies.

Episode.Title: Manifest
Episode.Synopsis: Mariah's political career comes under fire, and Cottonmouth picks up information that could put Luke on the run.

Episode.Title: Blowin' Up The Spot
Episode.Synopsis: Mariah campaigns to turn the city and the police against Luke, and not even Misty or Claire may be able to save him.

Episode.Title: DWYCK
Episode.Synopsis: With Luke wounded and on the run, Misty faces a soul-searching interrogation. Mariah's rise to power takes a dark turn.

Episode.Title: Take It Personal
Episode.Synopsis: Luke gets closer to the truth about Reva and her part in his fate, while Mariah wrestles with morality of her new role. Misty hunts for Luke.

Episode.Title: Now You're Mine
Episode.Synopsis: In one bold move, a friend from his past puts Luke on the defensive, Misty in dire straits, and Harlem's safety in jeopardy.

Episode.Title: Soliloquy Of Chaos
Episode.Synopsis: Misty digs deeper for the truth as the neighbourhood's power players throw the city into confusion.

Episode.Title: You Know My Steez
Episode.Synopsis: With all of Harlem bearing witness, Luke takes on the fight of his life in hopes of emerging as the defender his city needs.

Show.Description: A spin-off from Marvel's "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D." focusing on Bobby Morse (Mockingbird) and Lance Hunter.

Slingshot features the character of Elena "Yo-Yo" Rodriguez, an Inhuman with the ability to move with super-speed. As a person with powers, she must sign the recently instituted Sokovia Accords, the worldwide agreement that regulates and tracks those with super powers. However, the restrictions of the Accords are in direct conflict with a personal mission she’s desperate to fulfill. A mission that will test her abilities, her allegiances, and will include some tense encounters with certain S.H.I.E.L.D. team members.

Episode.Title: Vendetta
Episode.Synopsis: Now that Daisy has returned to S.H.I.E.L.D., Yo-Yo wants to talk to her about a secret the two of them share. In a flashback, we start to learn about the day Yo-Yo signed the Sokovia Accords. But we also discover Yo-Yo is tracking a dangerous threat from her past.

Episode.Title: John Handcock
Episode.Synopsis: Director Mace talks Yo-Yo through the signing of the Sokovia Accords. There are regulations to follow and severe consequences if the agreement is broken. When Yo-Yo feels that bureaucracy is getting in the way of her mission, she’s faced with a difficult choice.

Episode.Title: Progress
Episode.Synopsis: Having stolen Director Mace’s credentials, Yo-Yo is eager to further her mission of tracking down Colonel Ramon, but must first report to the lab. While Fitz-Simmons complete Yo-Yo’s Inhuman registration, she must find a way to continue her secret agenda, and hide the truth from Mack.

Episode.Title: Reunion
Episode.Synopsis: Agent May confronts Yo-Yo, accusing her of stealing the Director’s missing credentials. Yo-Yo maintains her innocence, but Agent May is not so easily fooled. Later, Yo-Yo reunites with an old acquaintance and digs up the past.

Episode.Title: Deal Breaker
Episode.Synopsis: Yo-Yo finds herself held captive by Ramon and discovers he has a connection to an old foe of S.H.I.E.L.D. When some unexpected help arrives, Yo-Yo gets her chance to exact vengeance against the man who caused her family pain.

Episode.Title: Justicia
Episode.Synopsis: Yo-Yo continues her confrontation with Ramon and decides whether he should live or die. She puts her super-speed powers to surprising use in a climactic moment. In the aftermath of her personal mission, Yo-Yo weighs her commitment to the S.H.I.E.L.D. team.

Show.Description: Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage, and Iron Fist team up to fight crime in New York City.

After discovering their parents are super-villains in disguise, a group of teenagers band together to run away from their homes in order to atone for their parents' actions and to discover the secrets of their origins.
